tldr: Affected versions of the package are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS). The `@clerk/nextjs` script does not support strict-dynamic CSP (Content Security Policy), making it more susceptible to XSS attacks.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@clerk/nextjs` library to the patch version.
